question: What is SmartLeadMagnet?
answer: SmartLeadMagnet is an AI-powered tool that helps businesses create personalized, high-converting lead magnets using a drag-and-drop interface.

question: How does SmartLeadMagnet work?
answer: Sign up, customize a lead magnet template, and embed the generated iframe code on your website to capture leads.

question: What are the pricing plans?
answer: SmartLeadMagnet offers one-time payment, lifetime access, and subscription plans. Additional credits can be purchased separately.

question: Can I cancel my subscription?
answer: Yes, you can cancel at any time, and your subscription will stay active until the end of the billing cycle.

question: Is SmartLeadMagnet secure?
answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and trusted payment providers like Stripe to secure your data.
